Detectors.SearchQuery: (filetype:credentials OR filetype:txt OR filetype:config OR filetype:sh OR filetype:bashrc OR filetype:bash_profile OR filetype:env OR filetype:ps1 OR filetype:py OR filetype:java OR filetype:js OR filetype:json OR filetype:yaml OR filetype:xml OR filetype:toml OR filetype:yml OR filetype:ini OR filetype:conf OR filetype:sql OR filetype:sqlite3 OR filetype:sqlite OR filetype:log OR filetype:properties OR filetype:ts OR filetype:php OR filetype:psd1 OR filetype:psm1 OR filetype:rb OR filetype:exports OR filetype:functions OR filetype:profile OR filetype:zsh_history OR filetype:doc OR filetype:docx OR filetype:xls OR filetype:xlsx OR filetype:pdf) AND ("AWS_ACCESS_KEY_ID" OR "AWS_SECRET_ACCESS_KEY")

(filetype:pem OR filetype:ppk OR filetype:key OR filetype:asc OR filetype:txt OR filetype:config OR filetype:xml OR filetype:py) AND ("BEGIN RSA PRIVATE KEY" OR "BEGIN DSA PRIVATE KEY" OR "BEGIN EC PRIVATE KEY")

Detectors.DetectorName: Private Key Found In Non-Standard Key File
Detectors.SearchQuery: (filetype:credentials OR filetype:txt OR filetype:config OR filetype:sh OR filetype:bashrc OR filetype:bash_profile OR filetype:env OR filetype:ps1 OR filetype:py OR filetype:java OR filetype:js OR filetype:json OR filetype:yaml OR filetype:xml OR filetype:toml OR filetype:yml OR filetype:ini OR filetype:conf OR filetype:sql OR filetype:sqlite3 OR filetype:sqlite OR filetype:log OR filetype:properties OR filetype:ts OR filetype:php OR filetype:psd1 OR filetype:psm1 OR filetype:rb OR filetype:exports OR filetype:functions OR filetype:profile OR filetype:zsh_history OR filetype:doc OR filetype:docx OR filetype:xls OR filetype:xlsx OR filetype:pdf) AND (begin NEAR(n=1) (RSA OR OPENSSH OR DSA OR EC OR PGP) NEAR(n=1) KEY)
(filetype:tf OR filetype:tfstate OR filetype:tfstate.backup OR filetype:tfplan OR filetype:yaml OR filetype:jinja OR filetype:yml OR filetype:pp OR filetype:bicep OR filetype:hot)
(filetype:jsp OR filetype:do OR filetype:java OR filetype:cfm) AND (getConnection NEAR(n=2) jdbc:)
filename:"running-config.cfg" OR filename:"startup-config.cfg" OR filename:"running-config" or filename:"startup-config"
(filetype:php OR filetype:phtml OR filetype:inc OR filetype:php3 OR filetype:php5 OR filetype:php7) AND (mysql_connect OR mysql_pconnect OR mysql_change_user OR pg_connect OR pg_pconnect)
filetype:kdbx OR filetype:kdb OR filetype:psafe3 OR filetype:kwallet OR filetype:keychain OR filetype:agilekeychain OR filetype:cred
("-SecureString" OR "-AsPlainText" OR "Net.NetworkCredential") AND (filetype:ps1 OR filetype:psd1 OR filetype:psm1 OR filetype:txt OR filetype:env)
filetype:rdg OR filetype:rtsz OR filetype:rtsx OR filetype:ovpn OR filetype:vpn OR filetype:RDP
filename:id_rsa OR filename:id_dsa OR filename:id_ecdsa OR filename:id_ed25519
filename:.bash_history OR filename:.zsh_history OR filename:.sh_history OR filename:zhistory OR filename:.irb_history OR filename:ConsoleHost_History.txt

(filetype:credentials OR filetype:txt OR filetype:config OR filetype:sh OR filetype:bashrc OR filetype:bash_profile OR filetype:env OR filetype:ps1 OR filetype:py OR filetype:java OR filetype:js OR filetype:json OR filetype:yaml OR filetype:xml OR filetype:toml OR filetype:yml OR filetype:ini OR filetype:conf OR filetype:sql OR filetype:sqlite3 OR filetype:sqlite OR filetype:log OR filetype:properties OR filetype:ts OR filetype:php OR filetype:psd1 OR filetype:psm1 OR filetype:rb OR filetype:exports OR filetype:functions OR filetype:profile OR filetype:zsh_history OR filetype:xls OR filetype:xlsx) AND ((client_id OR clientID) AND (tenant) AND (secret))
